did.abstract: Letters to Alman's wife, Caroline, written by Alman's comrades, chiefly Dan. P. Boger, describing experiences with the 7th North Carolina Volunteers, and imprisonment, probably at Point Lookout, Md. There are accounts of several battles in Virginia, including a skirmish at Orange Court House, 1862.
